info.description: API server for voice agent platform
info.title: Voice Backend API

get.description: Returns all agents owned by the authenticated developer

post.description: Creates a new agent for the authenticated developer

get.description: Returns a specific agent owned by the authenticated developer

put.description: Updates an existing agent owned by the authenticated developer

delete.description: Deletes an agent owned by the authenticated developer

post.description: Makes an agent publicly available in the marketplace
Adds a developer reply to a review on their agent

get.description: Returns all API keys owned by the authenticated developer

post.description: Creates a new API key for the authenticated developer

delete.description: Deletes an API key owned by the authenticated developer

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's profile

post.description: Upgrades the current user to developer status

get.description: Returns all agents installed by the authenticated user

delete.description: Removes an installed agent from the user's account

post.description: Installs a public agent for the authenticated user

put.description: Updates the granted scopes for an installed agent

get.description: Returns hourly metrics for an agent owned by the developer
Returns aggregated 7-day metrics summary for an agent
Returns paginated list of public agents in the marketplace
Searches public agents using semantic search
Returns details of a public agent by ID
Returns paginated list of reviews for a public agent

post.description: Creates a review for an installed agent

BearerAuth.description: JWT token from Better Auth. Format: Bearer <token>
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
